Headline: Generated 600,000+ impressions | I help Tech and Finance businesses create impactful brands that drive revenue | Trusted by 15+businesses | Ghostwriter + Copywriter.
Comment: Refreshing take on investor-founder relationships love the focus on partnership over policing and the emphasis on understanding over just numbers! Avik Ashar

Headline: Senior Healthcare Leader & Strategist | Founder, Body In Motion | Advancing Preventive Healthcare, Chronic Illness Rehabilitation & Sustainable Performance Globally
Comment: Choosing investors isn’t just about money - it’s about partnership, trust, and long-term support. Tough love from the right investors can make all the difference when plans go off-track. Avik Ashar

Headline: Founder @ OneAnt - Save more when we buy together
Comment:
Avik Ashar, my experience with angel funding has been… mixed.
We had a mentor-investor who, with all good intentions, offered advice that ended up costing us dearly because they had zero context in the domain we were building in. But to be fair, it wasn’t just the investor advice that led to disaster. Founder bias played a huge role too, I wanted to believe the path was clear. And in that optimism, I didn’t question enough, didn’t challenge enough.

Headline: 677 followers
Comment: Loved this perspective! true value from investors isn’t in day-to-day control, but in being long-term partners who listen, support, and guide through both highs and lows.
